page.title: 11HOMELIFE - DOMESTIC PETS
page.content: We have got 57 pets. We have got 8 goats which live in a stable in Spring and in Summer they go out to eat grass. At night they go in. We have got one sheep and a ram, our ram bunts you when you go into the field. The rabbits live in a cage, they eat ferns, oats and dandelions. They go out in the garden sometimes. Our guinea pigs are in a cage, I feed them in the morning and my sister feeds them at night. The ducks, hens and cockerels sleep in a pen. They come out in the daytime; they eat mash, oats and pellets. Our dogs sleep in the house, Rob is the biggest. Our parrot talks sometimes and he lives in a cage. The hamsters live in a cage in the kitchen. On Monday I went to do the animals, I did the chickens and the cats. We took the dogs down the field and my legs got very wet.
